docs.snippet: A barge breakaway at the Racine Lock and Dam on the Ohio River near Huntington, West Virginia, led to the closure of the waterway, the U.S. Coast Guard said on Thursday....

docs.snippet: Bolivian President Evo Morales has been treated for a sore throat in Cuba and will stay on the Caribbean island for several days of medical observation, Bolivia's Vice President and acting head of state Alvaro Garcia Linera said on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Bolivian President Evo Morales has been treated for a sore throat in Cuba and will stay on the Caribbean island for several days of medical observation, Bolivia's Vice President and acting head of state Alvaro Garcia Linera said on Thursday.

headline.main: Bolivia's Morales to Stay a Few Days in Cuba for Throat Treatment
headline.print_headline: Bolivia's Morales to Stay a Few Days in Cuba for Throat Treatment

docs.snippet: Hundreds of college students on Thursday protested a lecture by a writer some called a white nationalist, forcing the college to move his talk to an undisclosed campus location from which it was live-streamed to the original venue but couldn't be ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Hundreds of college students on Thursday protested a lecture by a writer some called a white nationalist, forcing the college to move his talk to an undisclosed campus location from which it was live-streamed to the original venue but couldn't be heard above protesters' chants, feet stamping and occasional smoke alarms.

headline.main: College Students Protest Speaker Branded White Nationalist
headline.print_headline: College Students Protest Speaker Branded White Nationalist

docs.snippet: As a grieving mother tried to hold her son's body after he was killed by a Florida sheriff's deputy, another deputy pushed her to the hospital floor, her husband testified Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: As a grieving mother tried to hold her son's body after he was killed by a Florida sheriff's deputy, another deputy pushed her to the hospital floor, her husband testified Thursday.

headline.main: Father: Deputy Shoved Mom When She Tried to Hold Son's Body
headline.print_headline: Father: Deputy Shoved Mom When She Tried to Hold Son's Body

docs.snippet: Costco Wholesale Corp. announced Thursday that it's raising its membership fees, as the warehouse club operator released quarterly results that fell short of Wall Street's expectations. Its shares fell more than 4 percent in after-hours trading....
docs.lead_paragraph: Costco Wholesale Corp. announced Thursday that it's raising its membership fees, as the warehouse club operator released quarterly results that fell short of Wall Street's expectations. Its shares fell more than 4 percent in after-hours trading.

headline.main: Costco Raises Membership Fees, Misses Earnings Forecasts
headline.print_headline: Costco Raises Membership Fees, Misses Earnings Forecasts

docs.snippet: U.S. law enforcement authorities on Thursday charged alleged members of the Central American-based MS-13 gang with the brutal murders of three Long Island high school students last year, as authorities press their campaign against a gang they desc...
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. law enforcement authorities on Thursday charged alleged members of the Central American-based MS-13 gang with the brutal murders of three Long Island high school students last year, as authorities press their campaign against a gang they describe as a criminal enterprise.

headline.main: Central American Gang Members Charged With Three New York Murders
headline.print_headline: Central American Gang Members Charged With Three New York Murders
